website_summaries.verdict: Low-priced racket that’s designed for players still learning the game but who want a good performance level.
pros: Oversized racket that works nicely for less experienced and intermediate-level players
Strung with tighter spacing in the middle for better ball speed
Carries a high level of durability
This model is made for daily play, even though it has a lightweight feel
cons: May not stand up to rough treatment

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this racket for 4 days now and I already feel better than I did with my last racket. I can tell by Its quality that it will last. I am 13 and this is my first Babolat racket and I can tell this is my best investment yet. $99 is a lot to me but it gives a lot of bang for your buck. I would strongly recommend this product to everyone ready to step up their game. Update, I have had this racket for around a month now and it still is holding up great and worth every penny I spent. If you’re thinking about this product you will be happy you purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Frances Yelton

customer_reviews.title: Good intermediate racquet!
customer_reviews.text: After playing with a cheap racquet for a while, this one feels like a big upgrade. Light weight, larger head. I wish the grip was black.
customer_reviews.author: Okan

customer_reviews.title: Precision racket for power hitters
customer_reviews.text: A Perfect doubles racket for intermediate players. Offers great control and spin. The string tension allows you to execute good drops and lobs. I did find my serve returns improve and give me that one more shot to stay in the point. My flat forehand and serve speeds did drop, but I’m okay with the trade-off for control and a more controlled (loopy) top spin forehand.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Best raqueta in the world.
customer_reviews.text: So lucky to have got this for this price. ReLly is a game changer. Fits my grip. I was a tennis player in high school (varsity) and had titanium raquets worth a couple hundred dollars and this is so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Can't return after you take off the plastic
customer_reviews.text: Took off the label and plastic to try out the grip size I guessed on since this was a surprise b day present for my daughter. Did nt feel as good as her current racket and she doesnt like the feel of this one. Went to return it and guess what this seller does not accept returns if the plastic is removed. This racket hasn't been out of our house or hit a single ball. Just touched. So maybe I will start playing tennis now since I have a nice un-used racket.
customer_reviews.author: AllysMom

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought his racquet for my son for Christmas 2018. He used it for his senior year tennis scheduled matches. Just started using it first practice was March 2019. Racquet cracked and split / broke already. It’s only May 6th 2019. I’m pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kelso

customer_reviews.title: great for my 13 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is just a great racket in the $100 price range. Got it for my 13 year old daughter and now I want one too. Her tennis coach said it's a great racket for her, but I love the feel of it too. Just so light and solid feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Craig in AZ

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!
customer_reviews.text: I joined a tennis league and bought this raquette because I played with a babolat in high school. So far so great!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Strings deformed within 4 plays
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of money. The strings deformed within 4 plays and since day one the racket wasnt playing right. So now on top of a $100 racket i have to pay $10 for strings and $35 to get it restrung. 50% increase. Before this racket i purchased a $60 racket from models and it was far better. Maybe the racket sat in the warehouse too long, but it was disappointing. I wish i could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Saad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company excellent racket
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I love this racket I love the people who sold it to me! The check to make sure I was satisfied they were gracious I really really recommend purchasing rackets from this company. I've dealt with other companies and had to return item was not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie M.

customer_reviews.title: It was great, until it wasn't
customer_reviews.text: I had this racquet for less than a month, and without changing the strings or grip, it played well. Yesterday while playing, I hit a forehand, and the side of the frame splintered all around. This happened because the force of the tennis ball, bent the string and snapped the frame. This was not from hitting the ground, or another object on the court. Pretty concerning that this would happen after playing with it 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice racquet but wrong grip size.
customer_reviews.text: We tried ordering this twice for my daughter. We ordered a 4 1/4 grip size but kept getting 4 1/2 which was just too big for her hand. Thankfully amazon return both very easily!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my Air Force son over seas and he loves it. It's beautiful and light weight. Sad that it broke after 3 months. Should've lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ang M

customer_reviews.title: You will like it
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this racquet. I have been playing for 10 months and I don’t have any complain. It feels light, powerful, and easy to drive. Perfect for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Flechita Loca

customer_reviews.title: Great racquet for begginers and more trained
customer_reviews.text: Easy to maneuver and great to learn as a beginner or intermediate player.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Unda

customer_reviews.title: An excellent racket stringed
customer_reviews.text: Like the performance which is very balanced Came in stringed which is handy The price is great compared to the same racket bought in Hong Kong just a few months ago
customer_reviews.author: york

customer_reviews.title: Love this racquet ! Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Love this racquet ! Bought 2 ... it’s super light weight lots of power with more control than my HEAD racquets. My tennis elbow really has gotten better after using these because control and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and good grip
customer_reviews.text: I like the grip of racquet and it is light weight. I recommend this from beginner to intermediate players.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a beginner level tennis class and it has worked great. Very light and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Omalley

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Quality racket as a beginner it is very useful to me. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great racket for my 11 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this racket..he's been playing for 2 years and was ready for an upgrade...I love Babolat for myself and this was a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great racquet
customer_reviews.text: Great one for a beginner. It’s perfectly balanced with a bigger sweet spot. I bought this for my girlfriend who is 45 so great for adults
customer_reviews.author: nathan armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy racket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it some time back for my son. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shilpa Pavan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This racquet is so good, it legit made my playing partner quit the game.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Strings come loose easily
customer_reviews.text: The frame performance of the raquet is good for its price. The only issue is that my strings were beginning to come loose after a month of recreational playing. The frame hasn't been compromised, but the string integrity isn't what I hoped. I'm going to replace the strings, but don't expect the strings to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Strings started to move and racquet vibrates afters 2 weeks of use.... very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Won’t let you return.
customer_reviews.text: It was not as good as it described. And I have only used it for two times, I felt it is not very comfortable for my hand. I contacted with seller who is not allowed me to do any refund. So disappointed. I purchased another one on other websites. I leave this one on the basement since I don’t use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

product_meta.title: Babolat 2019 Boost D (Boost Drive) Tennis Racquet - Strung with Cover
feature_bullets: Full featured maneuverable, oversize racquet for intermediate players
Babolat comfort from Woofer Grommet system in modern carbon fibre frame
105 head, 9.8 ounce strung, 27 inch long, 3 head heavy, 16x19 pattern
Strung with Babolat SpiralTex synthetic gut
Cover holds one racquet, with shoulder strap, is lightly padded to protect

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
